title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Let's analyse little bit based on info.What we know is this that crypto is created with USD.A lot USA financial instutions been poured money in crypto.And developers are russians.So what conclusion we got here?Btc and crypto Are Made by russian Brain and with USA money. So the btc are russian and USA mutual project If we look at all the IP adreses databases and all the data related to btc and crypto we can see a lot activity from USA and russian servers and people at first when btc was Young.The name like Satoshi nakamoto got really nothing to do with it's just some non existing name.Also If we look at the btc biggest whale it's grayscale let's connect the dots little bit About grayscale ceo micheal S well his the guy from new York very strong ties to wall Street so we can connect the dots.So crypto is funded by federal reserve and no Wonder becouse yanet yellen Are connected to grayscale and durov the telegram owner.So If we know it's russians and USA project then we know btc have BIG future i think they did not fund it If it Has no bright future.

comments.body: less tin foil and less drugs for you siryou shout russian but then capitalise USApick onebitcoin businesses are mainly USand the devs of bitcoin are mostly US/EUpieter wuille - belgiumgmax - americanGloria Zhao - chinese/americaandrew chow - singaporeWladimir Van der Laan- hollandfanquake - english

comments.body: Quote from: franky1 on December 11, 2022, 05:42:17 PMless tin foil and less drugs for you siryou shout russian but then capitalise USApick oneIm not saying Im against to them or i think they Are bad guys it just now we know who are the creators of btc we see the people who talk about mostly about btc we see who they Are associtied and connected we are smart we see everything info is public.But soon we should start asking questions from the btc founders what was idea and future plansAlso one biggest suspect is Larry Fink who might be one of the crypto founders.Anyways we can digg deeper i can investigate becouse people want truth once we know more we can Also make more money.Well it's now clear that btc are russians and USA mutual project.Why they did created this we should ask Vitalik buterin grayscale and durov they all know why but they don't explain much If i would Ever see them i Will ask about

comments.author: DooMAD
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 05:38:11 PMIf we look at all the IP adreses databases and all the data related to btc and crypto Which IP addresses?  You talk about info and then don't provide any.  And we're supposed to see you as somehow credible?Quote from: franky1 on December 11, 2022, 05:42:17 PMless tin foil and less drugs for you siryou shout russian but then capitalise USApick oneWhat's the matter, Francis?  Is the forum only big enough for one conspiracy theorist wingnut?  Worried about the competition from this loony?  Rest assured your title is safe.  No one here is a bigger crackpot than you.Also, you're probably the last person on the forum in any position to lecture on capitalisation, or grammar in general.

comments.body: future plansif you want to know about ethereum contact vitalik buterinif you want to know about XRP contact Brad Garlinghouseif you want to know about bitcoin plans contact adam back and barry silbertas for question about XRPpfft its not even a proper decentralised distributed blockchain. might aswell be a bank database at this stageas for doomadi can back up my research with data and stats. all you can cry is social drama of quotes from your buddies as proofoh and your fangirl devotion/defender of a sub-class commercial owned(DCG) network LN. it has in 5 years only managed to lock in and use as pegged collateral of only 5k btc for its small community of usersyet your idols(DCG) other network Liquid that uses tools like taproot have over 18k btc in taprootsbut if all you can do is try to defend corporate products and interests with insults about grammar. well thats on you

comments.author: pixie85
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 05:38:11 PMBtc and crypto Are Made by russian Brain and with USA money. So the btc are russian and USA mutual project That's so not true. You're making up fact and hope we'll do what? It's a stupid theory. The US would never work with Russia on a matter like this but let's say you're right and they'd somehow make BTC together. You start to mix BTC and altcoins like all cryptocurrencies are the same thing. The only thing you're proving to us is that you know nothing about bitcoin and altcoins. Before you start spreading FUD show us some proof that Satoshi is Russian.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: The only thing am learning here is that Bitcoin can be for anyone and for any country so anybody can be contributing for its development and the same time can do business with it. We should be happy that in USA though stricter regulations can be coming in for sure in 2023, there is no talk of banning it just like what China did. As to the possibility involvement of Wall Street, the only reason they ca be involved is that Wall Street is always looking for money...they will surely be there if there is something good for them but when things can be so negatively hot they will drop anything anytime...and that is what's happening right now all because we are still in a deep crypto winter capped by FTX/SBF saga. Now, OP can believe anything he wants but that's the end of it.

comments.author: vickyes
comments.body: This is undoubtedly a post that will be scolded. I think there must be very accurate credibility to say these things. In addition, BTC in the encrypted world is our consensus. I cannot accept the release of unfounded information about BTC.

In 2022?

comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on December 12, 2022, 06:33:48 AMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 11, 2022, 06:07:03 PMWill the xrp taking over btc with xrp utility and good things like transactions speed and good sacability of Are we honestly really once again talking about certain shit altcoins taking over bitcoin because of transaction speed? In 2022?Some people are still bag holding shitcoins that they bought years ago (a lot of them in 2017 when they were over-pumped already) so they are in a huge loss (some in 95% loss!) so they will keep talking about that shitcoin trying to convince others to buy it so that they can get their money back.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: So you're saying Russia and the United States are collaborating on Bitcoin? I can't believe it in any case where they are financial or military ideological enemies. Where did you get the information? Do you have a source or are you simply expressing your own opinion? I would agree if you said the US created Bitcoin or the Russians created Bitcoin. But it won't be together anyway. However, you should learn more about Bitcoin's history and how it got started. Don't shill for something about which you're not fully aware. It will only result in more spam.

So the btc are russian and USA mutual project I don't know how you've arrived here but i want to tell you that all these are a piece of crap because they are far from the reality, you're just mixing up things here with complications, USA currency is fiat and crypto is a different thing as well as bitcoin, they have no other correlation than a means of payment, every other thing differentiate them from each other.

comments.author: Artemis3
comments.body: No, they are using it because its working while their fiat is collapsing. That is the whole point, anyone can use it without discrimination.

comments.author: DooMAD
comments.body: Not to mention, we can always circle back to the unbeaten argument that, wherever Bitcoin may have originated from, there was no way for anyone to keep control over it.  It's well and truly unleashed.  No single points of failure and no individuals in a position of power to make unilateral decisions.  It belongs to all of us and can't be usurped.Even if the OP was right (and it's pretty obvious they're not), it still wouldn't be an issue.

comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Quote from: The Cryptovator on December 12, 2022, 12:00:47 PMSo you're saying Russia and the United States are collaborating on Bitcoin? I can't believe it in any case where they are financial or military ideological enemies. Where did you get the information? Do you have a source or are you simply expressing your own opinion? I would agree if you said the US created Bitcoin or the Russians created Bitcoin. But it won't be together anyway. However, you should learn more about Bitcoin's history and how it got started. Don't shill for something about which you're not fully aware. It will only result in more spam.I think the main reason why the op said that BTC is funded by the US is because he always sees a US dollar when identifying the value of BTC but this currency wasn't alone actually. We can also measure the value of BTC by using a different currency. They only put US dollar on default because this was the most popular currency among all. Now for the part where he said that BTC is created by Russians. Maybe that was true? Because. there's even a thread here which also questions if satoshi is a Russian. For the rest of us, we think satoshi is a Japanese because of its name. Oh well, all of this will remain to be as a speculation as long as there is no concrete evidence that have been found.
